ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:52:14 [Issue ID 4000-317822] urn:comicvine:4000-317822 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 19:02:26. [Issue ID 924946]
ComicInfo.Summary:
LANDMARK ANNIVERSARY ISSUE!
Just in time for the release of THE DARKNESS II video game from 2K Games and Digital Extremes, Top Cow proudly releases the over-sized 100th issue of one of their flagship characters. Long time writer PHIL HESTER (Wonder Woman, Green Hornet) concludes his epic run on the series with artist ROMANO MOLENAAR (THE DARKNESS II : CONFESSION) as Darkness bearer, Jackie Estacado comes face-to-face with the source of his power and misery - the Darkness itself! And only one of them will walk away...
ComicInfo.Tags: Sonatine,Hope Pezzini,Danny Estacado,Darklings,Jenny Romano,New York State,Jackie Estacado
ComicInfo.Title: Total Darkness, Part Five: The Darkness
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: FCO Plascencia,Jeremy Haun,John Rauch,Marc Silvestri,Michael Broussard,Michael Golden,Sunny Gho,Todd McFarlane
